articles.title: SBA: PPP Funds Exhausted for All But CDFIs, MDIs | ABA Banking Journal - ABA Banking Journal
articles.description: The Small Business Administration today informed trade associations that PPP funding has been exhausted and that the PPP application portal will on Tuesday stop accepting applications for loans from most lenders.
